Hoothoot (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0162: Furret
Pokémon
#0164: Noctowl →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Hoothoot (TCG Pocket).

Hoothoot has been featured on 16 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Hoothoot cards are normally Colorless-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Hoothoot

Hoothoot
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #

Hoothoot EX Unseen Forces 59/115 Meganium Constructed Starter Deck   007/016
Hoothoot Diamond & Pearl 85/130 Space-Time Creation  
Hoothoot HeartGold & SoulSilver 66/123 HeartGold Collection 058/070
Hoothoot HGSS Black Star Promos   HGSS05 L-P Promotional cards   025/L-P
Hoothoot Plasma Freeze 91/116 Spiral Force 043/051
Hoothoot BREAKthrough 119/162 Blue Shock 049/059
Hoothoot Burning Shadows 106/147 To Have Seen the Battle Rainbow 043/051
Hoothoot Unified Minds 165/236 Sky Legend 038/054
Hoothoot Sword & Shield 143/202 Shield 047/060
Hoothoot Astral Radiance 120/189 Battle Region 055/067
Astral Radiance TG12/TG30 Battle Region 073/067
Hoothoot Temporal Forces 126/162 Wild Force 054/071
Hoothoot Stellar Crown 114/142 Stellar Miracle 076/102

Hoothoot Prismatic Evolutions 077/131 Terastal Fest ex   127/187
